ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: This work was supported by funds provided by the Ministry of Science and Higher Education for research on SARS-CoV-2 and grants from the National Science Center (grants UMO-2017/27/B/NZ6/02488 to K.P. and UMO-2018/30/E/NZ1/00874 to A.K.-P.).
We declare no conflict of interest.
The funders had no role in the design of the study, in the collection, analysis, or interpretation of data, in writing of the manuscript, or in the decision to publish the results.
